forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Areas Of Fog
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Areas Of Fog then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog before 9am. Mostly sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As the city nestles into the cool embrace of night, wisps of fog begin to weave through the streets, their presence a soft blanket wrapping the world in mystery. The air is tinged with the freshness of moisture, while temperatures linger comfortably around 56 degrees. The gentle west-southwest breeze, modest yet persistent at ten to fifteen mph, whispers through the trees, hinting at the dance of the night ahead. For those venturing out, a light jacket or sweater would provide just the right touch of warmth against the slight chill, making evening strolls along the waterfront a most pleasant endeavor.

As dawn unfurls its glory on Sunday, the fog will gradually lift, revealing a canvas of blue punctuated by the golden hues of sunlight. Areas of fog will linger until mid-morning, offering a serene start before the day brightens to a refreshing high of around 70 degrees. The breeze, picking up in the afternoon to twenty-one mph at times, will add a lively rhythm to the air. Dress in layers to accommodate the shifting temperatures, perhaps opting for a light shirt beneath a cardigan, perfect for wandering through the park or enjoying a casual brunch at an outdoor café. Embrace the moments of clarity, as the day promises both beauty and comfort, inviting you to savor each detail that makes this city a timeless gem along the coast.
